## typescore

Simple tool to score the typing difficulty of text

```
typescore [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --arg-delimiter string   Delimiter to insert between args (default " ")
  -h, --help                   help for typescore
  -o, --only-scores            Only print scores, no input line
```
